title: Button, late 18th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Six circular medallions in the style of Wedgwood Jasperware; each ornamented with a head drawn in the Classic manner; white on blue ground.

On card 4

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Stoneware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-39-a/f.
